customer_reviews.title: Favorite product!

customer_reviews.title: Better than most.  But not "all natural".

And while fragrance is pleasant to smell, fragrance is unnecessary for skin care. I discovered this lotion in a hotel room. I liked the free sample enough to buy a larger size on Amazon.

Your fingers immediately feel less rough, but otherwise you absolutely can't tell that the lotion is on your skin unless you sniff at it or wash your hands.

I always stock up on the samples when we stay at Hilton Hotels (which is the hotel chain of choice for when we travel) but it only occurred to me recently to get a big 'ol bottle of it. It has a soft and clean smell, and is not overbearing. It's not greasy AT ALL which is a common complaint with lotions. This goes on smooth, dries quickly and leaves you skin soft, smooth and very lightly scented.
